TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class SoapExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapExtensionAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，指定 SOAP 擴充應該使用 XML Web Service 方法來執行。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a SOAP extension should run with an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務方法可以設定為以 SOAP 延伸模組執行方式是將屬性套用至 XML Web service 方法。XML Web service methods created using ASP.NET can be configured to run with a SOAP extension by applying an attribute to the XML Web service method. 當 XML Web 服務方法或用戶端 proxy 類別上的方法會加入自訂延伸模組屬性時，ASP.NET 會在適當的時間叫用相關聯的延伸模組。When a custom extension attribute is added to an XML Web service method or a method on a client proxy class, ASP.NET invokes the associated extension at the appropriate time. 延伸模組屬性是衍生自的自訂屬性類別。An extension attribute is a custom attribute class deriving from . 衍生的屬性必須覆寫屬性，以傳回與屬性相關聯的延伸的型別。Derived attributes must override the property to return the type of extension that is associated with the attribute. ## Examples 下列`TraceExtensionAttribute`類別衍生自以支援這個屬性套用至 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別中的方法。The following `TraceExtensionAttribute` class derives from to support applying the attribute to an XML Web service method or a method in an XML Web service client proxy class. 當套用至， `TraceExtension` SOAP 延伸模組會執行的方法。When applied to either, the `TraceExtension` SOAP extension runs with the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別必須覆寫屬性傳回的 SOAP 擴充功能類型。Derived classes must override the property to return the type of the SOAP extension. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是以一般的實作屬性。The following code example is a typical implementation of the property. summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定 SOAP 擴充的優先權。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or set the priority of the SOAP extension.
The priority of the SOAP extension.
